TextView.android:text:
1. Add your family members by going into Family Add Member.
 2. All your family members are visible there.
 3. Use Vaccination to look at vaccination card.
 4. Notifications will take you to notifications page.
 5. Updates of Polio camps will be posted there, one can acknowledge having given polio drops to his/her kids by simply clicking.
 6. This data is used by the Government Of India.
 7. Other health updates sent by the health department will also be posted there
